meaningMnemonic: You are going to <kanji>excuse</kanji> yourself from the situation, and in order to do that, you have <vocabulary>to escape from</vocabulary> the person / thing trying to hold you there in order <vocabulary>to avoid</vocabulary> them.
readingMnemonic: In order to do that, you jump inside your <reading>man(u) car</reading> (まぬか) which is a car for a tough man(u) that needs to drive fast, just like you.
